reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 406/07: REGULATED ACTIVITIES:  ADDITIONAL PRESCRIBED ACTIVITIES
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 406/07: REGULATED ACTIVITIES:  ADDITIONAL PRESCRIBED ACTIVITIES
reg_info.act_under: Mortgage Brokerages, Lenders and Administrators Act, 2006

content.content: 1. The following activities are prescribed for the purposes of paragraph 2 of subsection 5 (1) of the Act as activities that constitute administering mortgages: 1. Taking steps, on behalf of another person or entity, to enforce payment by a borrower under a mortgage.  O. Reg. 406/07, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The following activities are prescribed for the purposes of paragraph 2 of subsection 5 (1) of the Act as activities that constitute administering mortgages:

1. Taking steps, on behalf of another person or entity, to enforce payment by a borrower under a mortgage.  O. Reg. 406/07, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 406/07, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 406/07, s. 2.
